tag-visualeditor-description: An yi gyara ta amfani da [[{{MediaWiki:visualeditor-descriptionpagelink}}|Gyaran gani]]
tag-visualeditor-needcheck-description: An yi gyara ta amfani da [[{{MediaWiki:visualeditor-descriptionpagelink}}|Gyaran gani]] inda tsarin ya gano wikitext mai yiwuwa yana da canje-canje da ba a yi niyya ba.
tag-visualeditor-wikitext-description: An yi gyara ta amfani da editan wikitext na 2017
tag-visualeditor-switched-description: Mai amfani ya fara gyara ta amfani da editan gani, sannan ya canza zuwa editan wikitext.
visualeditor-feedback-tool: Bar ra'ayi game da wannan software
visualeditor-help-title: Jagorar yadda ake amfani da edita
visualeditor-welcomedialog-content: Kowa na iya yin gyara, kuma kowane ci gaba yana taimakawa.
visualeditor-welcomedialog-content-thank: Na gode don taimaka wa duniya gano Æ™arin!
